attributes.action: To stop making out that a person wearing a hoodie is a criminal or part of a gang.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's ridiculous and discriminatory to suggest that just because you walk out in a hoodie, you're going to go shoplifting. Stop penalising youth.
